item.description: It's Saturday night gentlemen! We will meet up in the parking lot at Ruby's at 8pm. We will head to up or on the rocks in Hartford where we have our own VIP section. All are expected to chip in for this we are going to tell the bouncer that we are there with Ace who has the spot reserved for us. Some of the women will meet us at Ruby's at 9pm.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be the tall guy with the Red Hair! I'll be inside or outside by my car
item.name: Saturday Night Sarge!
